trans-unit.source: Note that nothing will be copied into your Apache installation at this point. As a result, you do not need to run this as the root user unless installing it into a site wide Python installation rather than a Python virtual environment. It is recommended you always use Python virtual environments and never install any Python package directly into the system Python installation.

trans-unit.source: The first thing you must do is supply the

The first way of installing mod_wsgi is the traditional way that has been used by many software packages. This is where it is installed as a module directly into your Apache installation using the commands
trans-unit.target: mod_wsgi를 설치하는 첫 번째 방법은 많은 소프트웨어 패키지에서 사용되는 전통적인 방법입니다. 이것은 명령을 사용하여 Apache 설치에 직접 모듈로 설치되는 곳입니다.

trans-unit.source: The mod_wsgi package provides an Apache module that implements a WSGI compliant interface for hosting Python based web applications on top of the Apache web server.
trans-unit.target: mod_wsgi 패키지는 Apache 웹 서버에서 Python 기반 웹 애플리케이션을 호스팅하기위한 WSGI 호환 인터페이스를 구현하는 Apache 모듈을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: These are the directives needed to configure Apache to load the mod_wsgi module and tell mod_wsgi where the Python installation directory or virtual environment was located.

trans-unit.source: When installing
When started in this way, the Apache web server will stay in the foreground. To stop the Apache server, use CTRL-C.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법으로 시작하면 Apache 웹 서버가 포 그라운드에 유지됩니다. Apache 서버를 중지하려면 CTRL-C를 사용하십시오.

trans-unit.source: When using this approach, you will still need to manually configure Apache to have mod_wsgi loaded into Apache, and for it to know about your WSGI application.
trans-unit.target: 이 방법을 사용하는 경우에도 mod_wsgi가 Apache에로드되고 WSGI 애플리케이션에 대해 알 수 있도록 Apache를 수동으로 구성해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: With either installation method for mod_wsgi, you must have Apache installed. This must be a complete Apache installation. It is not enough to have only the runtime packages for Apache installed. You must have the corresponding development package for Apache installed, which contains the Apache header files, as these are required to be able to compile and install third party Apache modules.
trans-unit.target: mod_wsgi의 설치 방법 중 하나를 사용하여 Apache가 설치되어 있어야합니다. 이것은 완전한 Apache 설치 여야합니다. Apache 용 런타임 패키지 만 설치하는 것으로는 충분하지 않습니다. 타사 Apache 모듈을 컴파일하고 설치할 수 있으려면 Apache 헤더 파일이 포함 된 Apache 용 해당 개발 패키지가 설치되어 있어야합니다.

is a much simpler way of getting starting with hosting your Python web application. In particular, this installation method makes it very easy to use Apache/mod_wsgi in a development environment without the need to perform any Apache configuration yourself.
